set.name: DMART-22 Fabulous Art: Animal Masters: ~Duel of Cats~

property.name: Race
property.value: Mecha Del Dinero/Supercar Dragon

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, Choose 2 of the following. (You may choose the same one twice.): ► Choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -4000 power until the end of the turn: ► Put the top 4 cards of your deck into your graveyard: ► Put a creature that costs 4 or less from your graveyard. ■ When this creature would leave, you may destroy one of your other creatures instead.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMART-22 Fabulous Art: Animal Masters: ~Duel of Cats~

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Trinity Command/S-Rank Invader

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution: Put on one of your water, darkness or nature creatures. ■ SSS-Rank Invasion "Disaster": Water, Darkness or Nature Command (When one of your Water, Darkness or Nature Commands attack, you may put this card from the battle zone, your hand, graveyard or mana zone onto it.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature onto another creature, choose one of your opponent's creatures and put it into its owner's graveyard or mana zone or return it to their hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever your opponent puts a creature, that creature can't attack that turn. If that creature was put without paying it's cost, you may draw a card. TWINPACT ■ Choose a number. Until the start of your next turn, your opponent's creatures that have the same cost as that number can't attack or block.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever your opponent would choose a creature, they choose this creature if able. {MEGA LAST BURST} (When this creature leaves and is put into your hand, mana zone or graveyard, you may cast the spell side of this card for no cost.) TWINPACT {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures and return it to its owner's hand. ■ Draw a card.
